search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for BambooHR (bamboohr.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official BambooHR pricing page can be found at: [https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

BambooHR Plans
--------------

No matter what HR looks like at your company, we have the perfect plan for you!

### Core

Build your HR foundation.

_Recommended_

**HR Intelligence**

Smart insights for smarter HR decisions.

x

### NEW PRODUCT!

**Ask BambooHR**

Ask BambooHR is your AI-powered sidekick, handling routine employee questions about policy, benefits, and more, so you can focus on the bigger picture.

**Company Similarity Comparison**

Benchmark yourself against organizations of a similar size, industry, and growth stage.

**AI-Powered Insights**

A powerful AI engine that instantly reviews and categorizes eNPS® free responses into common themes.



 |

| **HR Data & Reporting**

Build reports that move the needle.

x**Employee Records**

Build custom reports in seconds using data from across BambooHR, with real-time previews to see your changes instantly.

**Workflows and Approvals**

Built-in workflows streamline employee information updates and time-off requests.

**Maximize your reach**  
Easily reach more qualified candidates. Post jobs to leading boards and your social networks.

**Email & Offer Letter Templates**

Simplify time-off requests, accruals, approvals and overall management.

Keep tabs on which team members are out on which days on this easy calendar.

**Create unlimited custom policies**

Customize time-off policies to fit the specific needs of your organization.



 |

| **Employee Experience**

Authentic feedback fuels growth.

x**Employee Satisfaction with eNPS**

**Employee Wellbeing**  
Know what your people need and want so you can make the right changes to improve culture, increase retention, and prevent burnout and premature turnover.

**Total Rewards**

Want to keep top talent? Total Rewards helps employees see the full value of their compensation, including benefits, perks, and incentives.



 |

Employee performance without the pain.

Capture a comprehensive view of employee performance with flexible and customizable assessments and feedback.

**1:1s**  
Enable regular one-on-one meetings through scheduling, note-keeping, and agenda-tracking to keep managers and employees aligned.

**Instant Reporting**

Quickly consume company-wide and employee specific performance with easy to understand reports.

Coming Soon

Add-on Solutions
----------------

Accomplish even more with additional capabilities.

![Image 8](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_10073d4bd29da70e27536660383e6459e12a1c341.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

#### Payroll

(US employees only)

*   Direct Deposit
    
    ### Direct Deposit
    
    Pay your employees accurately and on time with paychecks deposited straight to their bank accounts.
    
*   Flexible Pay Schedules
    
    ### Flexible Pay Schedules
    
    Manage flexible pay schedules and pay groups based on your specific needs.
    
*   Federal & State Tax Filing
    
    ### Federal & State Tax Filing
    
    BambooHR files all federal, state, and local taxes on your behalf to give you peace of mind.
    
*   Single Source of Data
    
    ### Single Source of Data
    
    Any data entered into BambooHR—including wages, hours, account numbers, benefits, deductions, and withholdings—is always included in payroll.
    
*   Specialized Support Team
    
    ### Specialized Support Team
    
    Direct access to a dedicated support team with extensive payroll knowledge.
    

[Learn More](https://www.bamboohr.com/payroll-software/ "Learn More")

![Image 9](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_19de6d07ef929244b7b2693a8d7506e6271f896a7.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

#### Benefits Administration

(US employees only)

*   Self-Guided Benefits Configuration
    
    ### Self-Guided Benefits Configuration
    
    Easily create, manage, and customize enrollment windows for open enrollment, new hires, and qualifying life events.
    
*   Open Enrollment, Life Events, and New Hires
    
    ### Open Enrollment, Life Events, and New Hires
    
    Employees choose and review their benefit elections in the same platform they use to request time off and manage their personal information.
    
*   Election Review and Approval
    
    ### Election Review and Approval
    
    Review and approve all employee elections and make edits to coverage levels, effective dates, and rates if necessary—all in one place.
    
*   Reporting & Data Review
    
    ### Reporting & Data Review
    
    Quickly review your benefits data at a glance, ensure accuracy, and easily export data for your broker or benefit providers.
    
*   Carrier Connections
    
    ### Carrier Connections
    
    Send employee enrollment data directly to a growing list of top benefits carriers, all without the hassle and error of double entry.
    

[Learn More](https://www.bamboohr.com/hr-software/benefits-administration/ "Learn More")

![Image 10](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_12bf99085c244328d13fe82e429eaebb590bda44f.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

#### Time Tracking

*   Mobile & Desktop Time Clock
    
    ### Mobile & Desktop Time Clock
    
    Clock in and out easily right from the BambooHR Home screen or with the mobile app.
    
*   Project Tracking & Billable Hours
    
    ### Project Tracking
    
    Assign your time worked to specific projects for internal tracking or billing purposes.
    
*   View & Edit Employee Timesheets
    
    ### View & Edit Employee Timesheets
    
    View hours worked, overtime, and holiday hours for each pay period, and customize individual access for review, editing, or approvals with permissions.
    
*   Automated Approval Workflows
    
    ### Automated Approval Workflows
    
    An automated task at the end of each pay period sends managers a simplified view of employee timesheets for review and approval.
    
*   Automatic Overtime Calculations
    
    ### Automatic Overtime Calculations
    
    Overtime pay is automatically calculated for all 50 US states, based on the employee's location.
    

[Learn More](https://www.bamboohr.com/time-tracking-software/ "Learn More")

![Image 11](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_142b98bdf2524613a102fa01640ebaefc3193bf4d.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

### Bundle & Save!

Get a 15% discount when you combine Payroll and Benefits Administration with the Core or Pro plan.\*

\* Bundle discount is currently only available for employees based in the US.

[Get a Price Quote](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/#scroll-to-form "Get a Price Quote")

[Explore the ROI Calculator](https://www.bamboohr.com/roi-calculator/ "Explore the ROI Calculator")

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

How much does BambooHR cost?
----------------------------

For companies with more than 25 employees, our HR software is priced on a per-employee, per-month basis. For companies with 25 employees or fewer, our HR software pricing is charged at a monthly flat rate. We never require an annual contract, and we automatically apply volume discounts as your employee count rises. All this means you receive a great price for our HR software with no hassle on your end. Reach out to one of our Account Executives for a price quote.

What payment methods do you accept?
-----------------------------------

We accept credit cards and ACH for customers paying monthly. We also accept wire transfers and checks from customers interested in annual prepayment.

Do you offer discounts?
-----------------------

Yes! Volume discounts are automatically applied to all accounts based on headcount. Your discount will increase as your headcount increases—no need to request it or negotiate new pricing.

*   Ask us about our bundle discount for purchasing HR, Benefits, and Payroll together!
*   We offer an additional 15% off to registered nonprofit organizations.

Does BambooHR integrate with other software?
--------------------------------------------

Yes! We currently have over 120 integration partners, and we’re always developing new ways to help customers in every industry build their own perfect, seamless solution. You can browse our extensive integration marketplace [here](https://marketplace.bamboohr.com/ "here").

How difficult is it to switch to BambooHR Payroll?
--------------------------------------------------

We designed BambooHR Payroll to be easy to use and easy to implement. You’ll collaborate one-on-one with a dedicated Payroll Project Manager to set everything up and run your first payroll. Expert support is always available anytime afterwards, too—no matter if it’s your 5th payroll run or your 500th.

Why BambooHR?

Our customers explain it best.
------------------------------

![Image 12](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_1d858841b8d096cb9c27499496fa54d155b7ad316.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

“Simply by automating time-off management, BambooHR freed $40,000 in increased capacity to support additional employees.”

#### Lisa Marino | HR Manager | Avidbots

![Image 13](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_1476cb9fff3c1289efb2e44d80af769655ff9df7e.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

“It does what you advertise. It does set me free. It makes it so much easier to do the work that I’m passionate about.”

#### Jennifer Fisher | Director of People and Culture | Ists

![Image 14](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_1df916a9b56346b88e352d2f896918166fc11b6d7.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

"We have literally saved thousands of dollars by switching platforms, adding in new features, and freeing up 90% of my time! Because of this I have even received a promotion!”

#### Rachel Schau | Chief of Staff | Rockford Silk Screen Process

![Image 15](https://www.bamboohr.com/pricing/media_1f379064484e518953e0cc7b2a82171e05635af5b.png?width=750&format=png&optimize=medium)

“Budget was our biggest reservation but once we did the math on rolling in Payroll, Performance Management, Time Off, HRIS, and ATS, our reservations were eliminated.”
